transArray.content: The service guy is very nice. After leaving the hotel, he will call to ask about his experience and suggestions. There are also fresh oranges at the front desk! The room is not big, but the bed is very comfortable, not too soft. I feel very relaxed after a night's sleep.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel, and thank you even more for taking time out of your busy schedule to encourage us. We treat every guest as our own family and strive to make every guest feel at home here, and your recognition is our greatest motivation. Our guest room sisters carefully prepare each room every day. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit. I wish you success in your work and a happy life! Manager: Zhao Dan
